org.forum.api.jdbc.dao

Interface MessageDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageDAOImpl

    public interface MessageDAO
    Persistence layer class provides methods to manage message entries in database using JDBC API library.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message createMessage(Message message)
      Connects to database and creates message entry in database with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
      void deleteMessageById(java.lang.Long id)
      Service deletes message entry in database based on specified id.
      MessageBody getMessageBodyById(java.lang.Long id)
      Connects to database and returns message body based on specified id mapped on MessageBody data model.
      java.util.List<MessageHeader> getMessageHeaderList()
      Connects to database and returns message headers with corresponding id mapped on MessageHeader data model.
      Message updateMessageById(java.lang.Long id, Message message)
      Connects to database and updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageHeaderList

        java.util.List<MessageHeader> getMessageHeaderList()
        Connects to database and returns message headers with corresponding id mapped on MessageHeader data model.
        Returns:
        list of MessageHeader data model

      • getMessageBodyById

        MessageBody getMessageBodyById(java.lang.Long id)
        Connects to database and returns message body based on specified id mapped on MessageBody data model.
        Parameters:
        id - id of message body to get
        Returns:
        MessageBody data model

      • createMessage

        Message createMessage(Message message)
        Connects to database and creates message entry in database with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
        Parameters:
        message - Message data model to create in database
        Returns:
        Message data model

      • updateMessageById

        Message updateMessageById(java.lang.Long id,
                          Message message)
        Connects to database and updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
        Parameters:
        id - id of message to update
        message - Message data model to update in database
        Returns:
        Message data model

      • deleteMessageById

        void deleteMessageById(java.lang.Long id)
        Service deletes message entry in database based on specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of message to delete
